website_summaries.verdict: Probiotics combined with digestive enzymes are a big help for most dog owners.
pros: Keeps dogs so regular “you could set your watch by them,” owners note
Most dogs like the chews, which are easier to give than tablets
High CFUs are a big draw, and owners report fast results
cons: Not all dogs like their taste
Some owners struggle to get their dogs to take it
A few reports of negative reactions after dogs eat them, such as vomiting

customer_reviews.title: Made both of my dogs sick.
customer_reviews.text: I was giving my dogs a probiotic from another company with good results. This one was more economical, made in the USA, and had good reviews, so I decided to try it. Both of my dogs got sick while they were taking it. After discontinuing it's use both of them got better. Maybe I got a bad batch, but I'm not taking any chances and I'm not going to be using any more of it.
customer_reviews.author: Video Nutt

customer_reviews.title: The Second Best Thing To Buying A Puppy Again
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Once you give your dog these they'll begin to have the same energy as they did as a puppy... And that's a lot to handle :) All joking aside, you know what's interesting? I really think the made in U.S. makes a huge difference. I'm always worried what's REALLY in products sourced from other countries. It's relieving to know these are made in right here in the states. These flat out work... and fast. You'll notice the difference within a week. P.S. Should have bought this for the neighbors dogs too. They get jealous sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my senior Frenchie
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my senior Frenchie!! My dog was having really bad diarrhea and nothing would control his issue. Took him to the vet and she treated him with shots, changed his food and I had to mix rice in his food to help with the diarrhea to no avail. This is a game changer! Love this product!! He must have a chew 2x daily. Morning and then at night and he loves them, he gets them as treats right after his walks.
customer_reviews.author: LMV

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates Gorilla Breath!
customer_reviews.text: After countless internet searches to find something that would help our Maltese with terrible gorilla, kill anything that gets in his way, breath. One a day and within a week, the bad breath went away. We've now been using this product for several months and we find that in addition to eliminating his bad breath, it helps him stay regular. If your dog has breath that kills plants in your house, give this product a try. Oh, and he loves the taste of his evening treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kal's Creations

customer_reviews.title: These made my little baby sick.  Gave her bad diarrhea.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Gave my dog bad diarrhea. I was giving her another brand which was great. No problems what so ever. Tried this product and made my dog very ill. Who in their right mind puts psyllium husk in dog products. That causes diarrhea. This product should be removed from the market!
customer_reviews.author: Micheleann

customer_reviews.title: Fixed our Dog's "Butt-Breath"
customer_reviews.text: Our hound/lab developed unexplained bad breath. The vet described it as "Butt-Breath" and said it was some sort of bacterial smell from his digestive system. We treated with a round of antibiotics and it went away, for five months. When it returned, I didn't want to treat with antibiotics again as the cause was clearly still there. After about two weeks of one a day of these probiotics the smell has disappear. They have obviously cleared up any bacterial imbalance. I will likely use them going forward on an intermittent or as needed basis. Very pleased for a healthier solution to the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic for the price that I could find.
customer_reviews.text: One more strain than the one I was using and better value. I did price comparison and these were 15 cents/each while the others were 13. BUT then I read the labels and you only need HALF as many of these to accomplish the same job. I have puppies with happy bellies and I'm saving money! They think they're treats and they are very regular
customer_reviews.author: InkfingersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price! These work!
customer_reviews.text: We have a smaller dog with digestive issues. He was getting diarrhea fairly often, so he was on a very restrictive diet. We had to be careful with his snacks, since he doesn't do well with chicken. He also can't have people food. Since starting him on this, he's been so much better! He's only had a couple of episodes. I have to mention that he won't eat these chews, so I break them in half and coat them with a little peanut butter. He now eats them with no hesitation, and he's been healthy and happy. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: K. LORI

customer_reviews.title: Allergic skin reaction to this
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks eating two per day as directed, my frenchie developed scans on his neck and raw scabbing areas on this face in his wrinkles. I take care of his bulldog wrinkles every day, so this was not due to anything else. Once I stopped these, his skin issues cleared up within 4 days. Be aware that this and any supplement may cause allergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss treats?
customer_reviews.text: The probiotic powder we usually use from another brand ran out and I decided to give these treats a try. Unfortunately, my 7 year old Rottweiler started throwing up the next day. I gave it three weeks thinking there might be an adjustment period, but that just gave me another few weeks of vomit to clean. He lost about 10 lbs and continued to be sick until a week after we switched back to the previous brand. By that time, I no longer qualified for a refund. It wasn’t a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Clem75

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Treats w/ Benefits
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving my girls ( 2 chihuahua mixes) these treats for some time now. I take my own biotics so I wanted to give them something to keep their guts healthy too. One of my girls tends to have a sensitive tummy anyway and this truly seems to help her stay on an even keel. I kennel them at night and this is their crate incentive. They even know when it's time for bed and I grab that canister, take the lid off, to head straight for their bedding. It's awesome to see and makes me laugh every time. Thanks ...
customer_reviews.author: robsmith70

customer_reviews.title: No problem getting my pooch to eat these
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Almost 2 weeks on these and my dog can now kiss my face without making me gag. These are amazing! My dog loves the flavor of these chews! I started her on these yesterday with the hope it will balance the bacteria in her gut to then help with her breath (she's raw fed so I'm sure that is a culprit). I can't say how they work yet (time will tell, it's been one day!) but in the meantime I'm pleased with the product. They are a good size, don't smell strange and a great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: DWC

customer_reviews.title: Dog would not eat them they smelled horrible.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old dog has been on another brand for years. They were not available so I decided to give these a try. Big mistake. She barely would touch them. They Stink and are stale. They have no safety seal on them...at least the ones I received had no tamper proof seal. I would think they should have one. I will not buy this brand again. Same happened with the other product that I bought from this brand. They were stale and smelled horrible. So disappointed. Being on a limited income and spending almost $40.00 only to not be able to use it is a bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Suthrn Angel

customer_reviews.title: No more tummy aches!
customer_reviews.text: These chewable probiotics have worked wonders for my dogs! One in particular has always had digestive issues and couldn't handle a lot of different types of foods. These have not only helped his tummy, but his skin and fur as well. Super soft pup who no longer has a stinky breath! I didn't even have to change his dog food (after already trying everything on the market for "sensitive stomach" with no luck). I give him just one chew a day, and he actually likes the flavor! He is happier and more playful since his tummy doesn't hurt anymore, and he can enjoy the same foods and treats his brother gets :)
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dogs with Tummy Troubles!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 year old lab who has been having stomach issues. I have recently learned that the digestive enzymes decreases as a dog gets older. I purchased these for my baby girl, and she loves them! Her appetite has returned, and she gobbles these up. Being that she is 80 lbs, she is getting 3 a day for one month, then she will get 2 per day. I highly recommend this product! It has a flavor that my dog loves, and is really easy for her to chew.
customer_reviews.author: ChelBellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: after receiving the product i had to wait because my pup had to be put on antibiotics and i didn't want to cancel anything out but now that he is done his medicine, within a few days of taking the product i have notice a difference. since we had him, little of a year, he had a lot of stress as he is afraid of people or anything that is out of place, he has been referred to the cow patty pup as his poop resemble that of a cow. but his poop is more solid now. Very happy with this product and he is willing to take them unlike the multiple medicine he was on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having a lot of stomach problems. Took him to the vet several times, they couldn’t find anything. He would wake up a couple of times a week, his stomach growling really loud, sounded like aliens. He would go out eat grass, and throw up. He wouldn’t eat anything until later that night. Went through the whole food changing thing several times buying sensitive stomach food. The last food I bought from amazon, I saw an add for these. They worked wonders, no more growling stomach or throwing up. These were a miracle. If you have an animal with stomach problems you definitely need to try these.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are easy to take and she looked forward to it as ...
customer_reviews.text: When my 8 week old GSD puppy arrived, she had a very sensitive stomach. I did my research and found that a Probiotic would help her with this issue. I started her on a regimen of Probiotics and before I knew it she was regular again. These are easy to take and she looked forward to it as if I was giving her a treat !!! Thank you for such a good product !!! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs, Valentine

customer_reviews.title: One of the few things my dog will eat!
customer_reviews.text: My older dog is getting very picky and doesn't like to eat her food & refuses to take her pills (even with products designed to cover them), so I didn't have a lot of hope for this. But she likes them! The cool thing is that I can crumble them over her food and it even motivates her to eat more than normal. I wish I had known about this a long time ago but only just realized she probably has always had issues caused by poor digestive enzymes.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Hughes

customer_reviews.title: but all of my dogs absolutely love them! I was very surprised and very happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried that my dogs might not want to eat these because some of them are picky, but all of my dogs absolutely love them! I was very surprised and very happy about that! They really seem to be helping with some digestive issues I was seeing in two of my dogs. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Teel

customer_reviews.title: probiotic for dogs, great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. My chihuahua/terrier mix had on and off soft stool. this product firmed up his stool. An even more impressive turn around was a friend's dog came to stay with me that had chronic diarrhea and following the instructions, gave two doses a day. The diarrhea cleared up in a matter of days and no problems since! this stuff is the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: what the heck I'll buy these forever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start for one Normally when you get something like this you don't get a quick noticeable response. But not here my dog's stomach was making noises really loud ones I could tell that she was developing diarrhea I gave her one of these within a minute the noises stopped. I thought this might be a fluke and I did it another three times and it's not a fluke. I've decided to make this one of their regular doggy treats forever. when they see me gon for this container they get so excited and they take it from me gently and they just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Both my Labs love these chews like treats. The product came sealed and fresh. Both my labs are older and one has had digestive problems for many years. This one Lab developed bad diarrhea for a solid week and started eating his poop when he had a chance. All indications were an enzyme deficiency. After just two days of three chews a day, he started having normal poops and is starting to look healthy again. This will be a regular part of their routine and diet from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hartley

customer_reviews.title: $$$!Worth Every Dollar!$$$
customer_reviews.text: Active Chews is by far one of the best dog brand vitamins I’ve found. They are affordable and get shipped quickly! My dogs love the taste and get excited anytime I grab the jar. I use the Probiotics and the Healthy Joint & Hip chews. I definitely noticed a declining difference in my dogs when they weren’t taking the vitamins. Cannot get enough of this brand! They’re not sticky and don't stink like some of the other brands either!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I had impressive instant results with these chews. I adopted a dog 1 month ago and her stools have been runny to the point that I couldn't even pick them up with a bag. I tried switching to a sensitive food and giving pumpkin and neither helped. I gave her 1 of these and she had her first firm stool soon after eating it. I couldn't believe it. Her stool issue has been completely resolved by these and she loves the taste of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great health benefit for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I myself take probiotics so it only made sense for my dogs too also! My 10 yr older Schnauzer was starting to have digestive issues, runny stool etc. after only 1- week he's back to nirmal & even more energetic! I'd recommend these to all dog owners! They eat these first thing in the morning, readily awaiting to chew them up before breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Diva

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I give to my dogs on a daily basis. My dogs get upset stomachs and they don't always eat right away. I don't hear their stomaches as much due to them not eating. Just like humans, dogs need the good flora also. They love the taste. Never have to force them to take. I have ordered this product many times. I am very happy with the product. The price is good also.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them and are a perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old Sheepie has a very sensitive stomach. She would throw up when I would introduce new treats or she would eat too quickly.I figured probiotics are a natural healthy way to help her digestion.I give her 2 of these a day as a substitute for treats. She absolutely loves them and hasn’t vomited since we started her new routine. I am sold and will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy DeOliviera

customer_reviews.title: and they love these. No hassle getting them to take them ...
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second container of these. initially we ordered these while one of our rescues was on a strong round of antibiotics ... but we now give a single does daily to all of our guys. The dogs are much less gassy, and they love these. No hassle getting them to take them (and they are picky) . One container lasts a pretty long time. Very happy. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Saved me trips to the vet
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd has awful skin problems. She gets hot spots, infections, you name it. After many trips to the vets and tons of medication I looked into other products. I tried this after a suggestion from a dog forum. Holy heck it works. First she poops regularly now, and has more formed poops. Her skin as cleared up, no more itching, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MsgrimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The "Princess" loves them
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these and they seem to agree with her. I'm not sure how probiotics work in the big scheme of things, but it was recommended that we give them to her. We only give her two a day, despite the recommendation on the bottle for her weight. We tried one at first and that wasn't quite enough. Two seems to be plenty for her; you might want to test on your particular breed and weight of dog to see what works best.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Steele

customer_reviews.title: Happy Tummy at last!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had an extremely gassy and gurgle tummy. We would constantly (1-3 times a week) need to give him Ompresole (as directed by our vet). We've been using these probiotics with him for over a year and he's so much less gurgley! We only need to give him some meds maybe once a month. Thank you for making his tummy finally happy!
customer_reviews.author: MrsQwnBee

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Beware! My dogs itching has subsided, but he developed anal sac disease from ingesting these! He’s been to the ER twice and I’ve spent tons and tons of money. Antibiotics and pain meds. The vet told me to cease giving him these because they are the cause of his anal sac disease, which he’s never had his entire life until after taking this probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bills

customer_reviews.title: Best thing out there!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! If anyone is wondering it does help if your dog is eating poop! Mine was constantly doing it and after 2 weeks he completely stopped! I have a small dog so 1 a day lasts us 3 months! Definitely gonna continue to get this product! The “treat” doesn’t smell bad at all. It’s soft and squishy like a regular dog treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic product for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Great probiotic product for dogs. My dog loves the flavor, soft tablets. It keeps her diarrhea in check. She's been on these chewy tabs for a two months. Product is as described, made in USA, ships quickly. Reasonably priced. I called customer service and they answered my questions immediately. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: For my older dogs
customer_reviews.text: Well I don't know about the taste but my dogs eat them. I got these to try to get my blind old dog to stop eating poop. I read probiotics can help adjust his cravings and desire to eat poop. So far it's worked pretty good. I have 3 dogs, 2 or elderly and I know they have a different vitamin requirements than they have been getting. I'm on the 2 bottle and they be seen to have a better pep in their step.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Ruffin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have a nine-year old Doberman. I recently noticed a decline in his appetite along with softer stools (not watery). Along with these, I also noticed his breath was a bit malodorous. Tried the chicken and rice thing, but there was little improvement with his digestive issues. I read about this product, and taking the reviews into consideration, decided to order it. He loves them! After only the SECOND DAY of taking them, there was a marked improvement in my Doberman's breath, as well as his stools. We are on the third day, and his halitosis is all gone, and he's again eating me out of house and home. This thing works, it works quickly, and it WORKS WELL!
customer_reviews.author: V. Redd

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Happy Dog - No Tear Stains!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is a 12lb Shorkie had a pretty ugly looking tear stain problem. Daily, I give - 1 Active Chew and - 1 doggie vitamin per day with his dinner with fresh filtered water. And the tear stain problem has gone away, All you can see are his big beautiful black eyes. Bonus, he loves the tastes. We are very happy with Active Chews!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused a rash, but was refunded
customer_reviews.text: After three chews over three days, my dog developed a terrible itchy and blistering rash on his underside. The rash eventually went away within three days of stopping the chews. Nothing else in his diet or environment changed during that time. The seller refunded me fully, so I'm grateful for that at least.
customer_reviews.author: Herz Suli

customer_reviews.title: It.s our NUMMY for the day
customer_reviews.text: My little Girls like variety in their Menu , sometimes this leads to change in habits, Not with probiotics , Everyday is O.K. even with variety of palate changes. They will be 9yrs. old and their vet. says they are in great shape, healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Our senior German Shepherd dog developed digestive issues and the vet recommended probiotics for her. We chose the Active Chees because they are made in America and have active probiotics. She loves them and thinks she’s getting a treat! We love the because she is more comfortable, the diarrhea has stopped, and they are affordable! We are on month two and couldn’t be more pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: nanajan

customer_reviews.title: Solved my puppy's frequent loose stools
customer_reviews.text: We have an Irish setter with a "sensitive" GI tract. He'll do well for weeks and then just start having frequent, watery stools. Since starting this probiotic, his GI tract has been "rock solid" so to speak. And he likes the taste of the chews. We'll definitely continue him on these probiotic chews.
customer_reviews.author: Redrock Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this to my dog based on a recommendation from my son who is a microbiologist. He gives them to his dogs with good results. I have a German Shepherd who had extremely soft stools and this probiotic really helped to firm her stores up to normal shape. She has been taking them for over two years now.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Miller

customer_reviews.title: Old dog has energy again
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these chews. We have on automatic order and it arrives just as we are running out. I only give to our dog that needed extra health support as it would cost a lot to give to 4 big dogs regularly. I don’t notice gas with the dog getting these. She is full of energy and eager to get her treat with her meals. They are more substantially sized than others we have tried so I feel like we get more for our money.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Far cheaper than Purina Fortiflora
customer_reviews.text: I had giving my older dog Purina Fortiflora to stabilize horrible bowel movements.While the Purina was very good..it's also very expensive! About $1.00 a day per dose. I was looking for an alternative tried this..After a month it works equally as well for a cost of about 40 cents a day. ( I did the math )
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My two 40 lb dalmatians love these probiotic chews. They consider them a treat and wait by the pantry for one each morning. This product really works to keep their tummies healthy. My oldest is prone to getting diarrhea, but once we started her on the probiotics we don't have that issue anymore. The price is very reasonable, too. Thank you, Active Chews, for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Sosebee

customer_reviews.title: Finally some relief for my fur baby
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie has always suffered from a seriously sensitive stomach, including frequent bloody stools. After just one week I have seen a tremendous difference. No more stomach gurgling or diarrhea. Her energy level has increased and she feels better overall. THIS PRODUCT WORKS! I wish I had found it sooner - Don't hesitate to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Cjthomas3906

customer_reviews.title: My baby's healthy 'Tummy treat'
customer_reviews.text: Shes yelling at me for her active chew lol Seriously though I give her one every morning and as soon as I get up she walks over and stands by the counter where I keep them. If I'm not fast enough I get a few barks :) Shes 12 and has a delicate digestive situation. Her tummy us much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel N

customer_reviews.title: I wanted these to be good for my dog but...
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not do well with these. He is a yorkie poodle mix with a sensitive gi tract so that may be an issue here also. I noticed that these treats made my dog gassy, it gave him very hard stools and gave him red itchy skin. All these symptoms went away after not giving him these treats for about three days after he got them for about two weeks, when I fed them to him I only gave him the recommended amount per the packaging but ultimately I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that dogs will eat without hiding in something else.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried other products but our two dogs are picky and usually drop it before chewing. However, pleasantly pleased with this one as the flavor and smell actually makes them eat them right away...and the size and texture is pleasing to them also. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stonehouse

customer_reviews.title: Free item possible scam
customer_reviews.text: So I received a text saying I would get a free item if I wrote a review and posted it and sent a screen shot in return. I did and received a reply that my pizza was ready. The product was good but am warning people about what I saw as a scam to get free product. We have switched back to our regular brand. They both work the same
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mattern

customer_reviews.title: Three dogs will eat it, one won't.
customer_reviews.text: It crumbles easily. It doesn't smell bad. Cats won't eat them. Easy to mix in with other foods. I don't know what it's supposed to do. We got it to see if it would help with dog farts and puking. It's working enough that we don't want to not give it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Apex Penguin

customer_reviews.title: This really helped my 2 dogs!
customer_reviews.text: both my dogs have upset stomachs but this stuff really helped with gas,there poops look more solid and most importantly no more random upset stomach which lead to puking. Both eats these with no problems at all! Will continue to buy more and i love that they are made in the US!
customer_reviews.author: Kakiraz

customer_reviews.title: They work for our doggo.
customer_reviews.text: For people who have dogs with sensitive tummies/digestive issues, probiotics can be a big help. We already use a simple ingredient, high quality dog food but noticed a great improvement after starting Active Chews. I gave flavor five stars, however this is not based on my sampling, pup gobbles them up!
customer_reviews.author: Holly L

customer_reviews.title: A Chew my Picky GSD will actually eat.
customer_reviews.text: My GDS is very active outdoors. We hike twice a day through the woods and he's off leash exploring most of the time.. so these chews are also an ounce of prevention if he "snacks" on anything while out of sight. He have been one this brand of probiotics for most of life, and we have never had digestive and gas issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Saved our noses!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted an Australian cattle dog (blue heeler) that had such bad smelling farts we almost named her Stinkbomb. We researched ways to remedy this and stumbled upon probiotics for dogs. Us humans use probiotics, so it made sense to us! Within 2 days, she was still farting up a storm, but the smell was greatly reduced. After 4 days now, she hardly farts at all (or if she does, we can’t tell)! Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Dillard-Crazy Wolf

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pro-biotic. It works great for my Welsh Terrier. He was having some digestive issues and it's really made a huge difference for him. I have had him on these for over a year and will not ever stop giving them to him. In fact, I am on auto ship for this product. Price is great too. So much less expensive than the products the vet sells for this issue. Try it - you won't be disappointed. I have a close friend who now gives them to her dog too and is also pleased with results.
customer_reviews.author: Book/Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Yorkies approved
customer_reviews.text: Both Yorkies love these! The one thing I noticed a big improvement on is their breath is pleasant after eating these. Tried powders and sometimes they would just walk away from the bowl. Convenient canister to keep them fresh. Having 2 fur babies makes this economically for us.
customer_reviews.author: sallyofkansas

customer_reviews.title: 12 year old dog feeling better than ever
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old has had a variety of allergies and stomach sensitivities since the day we brought her home. We've changed foods and snacks, tried herbal supplements, and even vet prescribed medication. While we've tried other probiotics in the past, it was always a fight to get her to swallow or eat them. Were on our second container of these and not only does she think they are snacks and eats them on her own, but we go weeks now without an upset stomach where before introducing these, it was a week at the most. 12 years late, but we finally figured out the probiotic for her - hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Baca

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to order this.
customer_reviews.text: Number one reason is made in the USA. This product seems to have helped the finicky stomach for one dog and the paint peeling gas of another. I have three dogs and like that I don’t have to order as often as I did with smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: motherduck

customer_reviews.title: Been great for our pitty
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using Active Chew Probiotic supplements for well over a year now. They’ve been great at helping our dog manage her yeast overgrowth. She no longer is constantly licking her paws/ undercarriage. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cherripunk

customer_reviews.title: Happy Pup. Loose to Logs in as little as a month.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great stuff. We started using this cause our Berner was having some serious run issues. Sensitive tummy. Once we went through the initial multi day dose her poo's have solidified. We now keep her on a single dose daily. A small price to pay for not having to scrape her leaving from the grass so she doesn't accidently step in it and track it into the house. She loves them. All I have to say is probiotic and she comes running.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lemieux

customer_reviews.title: Craziness
customer_reviews.text: Recieved today and I am only writing this soon because its 6 hours later and the almost 6 month old puppy is acting his age. He hasn't vomited today. He's eaten well and now playing which over the last several weeks he hasn't been. Will update a week or 2 from now but I'm very hopeful because adding this was the only difference between today and last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not as tasty as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I think these are a value and are made with quality ingredients however, I have a hard time getting my dog to eat them. The product says that dogs love the taste but mine really doesn't care for them and it is a bit of a struggle daily to get her to take them. I will probably try a different probiotic once these are gone just to make our lives easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk R. Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: No More Stinky Farts!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this out for my dog after she started having chronic stinky gas. One package has made an immense difference. Not one stinky fart from her since about a week after she started taking them. I will definitely be keeping her on them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaLou

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love ‘em
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what it is about these chews whether it’s flavor or scent. All I know is that my two small dogs gulp ‘em down in a flash. My dachshund barks at me if I forget to give him one. Dogs have lease flatulents & I feel good about giving these to them. I’m on my second container!
customer_reviews.author: christine ostberg

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater likes treat
customer_reviews.text: So far my picky Boston terrier loved the treat. He won’t eat anything I try to give him but liked these ones. He is old and I hope it help with digestion. Five star because he will at lease eat them . Will revise when I see if help him firm up poop.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for dogs with GI problems
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Cocker had horrible stomach issues, he had diarrhea at least 3-4 days a week. After endless testing the Vet found nothing medically wrong so I decided to try a Probiotic and it was worked wonders !!! He’s fine now !!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this one...
customer_reviews.text: We have been giving this to our pug for 2 weeks now and he loves eating them although he does not have a very discriminating palette, hah. He has a sensitive stomach and although he has not thrown up since using them, he has been gassy and had very soft poops. I'll give this another week and see if this improves.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Brooklyn approves!
customer_reviews.text: Even with regular brushing, at 11 my boxer has been having bad breath, these probiotic treats have made a huge improvement with the bad breath. Also has reduced her gas. Definitely a “treat” well be keeping in her diet! Brooklyn looks forward to these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Keep your dogs healthy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these chews and I feel great about giving them. My 11 year old has not had any stomach issues since I started giving her these last year. Way more convenient than probiotic powders and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Active chews great treat  and has helped with tummy issues!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs like them a lot only been using little over a week still hoping it will help more with the gasiness. I will continue to use them for now.they are around 1/4 inch thick if not more and kind of soft. They have a meaty scent to them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pasten

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a different probiotic but I think it actually made my dog’s stools really loose. That one had a lot of pumpkin in it. This one is based With duck meat. It seems much better ... at least for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: art teacher

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs that like to eat things in the garden that tends to make them have digestive troubles, after four days, my dogs were "solid" again, and since I have been giving them the probiotics daily, and have not had any troubles since. Highly recommend, and the dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinesreads

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dogs breath
customer_reviews.text: My dogs breath has improved dramatically after taking Active Chews. I took a couple of weeks but my husband and I started noticing the difference in our dogs breath. He is a lap dog so very up close and personal all the time. He is very active happy and now, so are we.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Dog more sassy than gassy
customer_reviews.text: Pearl the pup had a serious gas problem. Since using these, she has been almost gas free! These also do not have much odor of their own, so they sit in the kitchen as a morning treat for Pearl while we have breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Squid Nigiri

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs got the runs.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs got diarrhea from this. I read reviews from other probiotic brands and believe it's a common occurrence. Some dogs have issues so probably nothing wrong with these. Going to wait and try again and if they get the runs again we'll donate them to another dog family and hopefully they'll have better luck. Reviewed by Peggy
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dog absolutely loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these!! And he definitely needs the probiotics being a 12-13yr old mastiff as mastiffs are only known to live around 7 or 8 years ... Thanks for making these awesome healthy treats - 💯🙏💯
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rad

customer_reviews.title: These make my puppy sick
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my American Leopard Hound puppy thinking they would help her digestive system and also make her poop and gas less stinky. Well I was very disappointed because they pretty much did the opposite for her. I tried them for a few weeks and all they did was make her sick and her poop and gas smell got even worse. Maybe every dog is different, but I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; Great Vendor
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product seven times and couldn't be more satisfied. My dogs think they're treats and look forward to getting one each day. I honestly think they're the best probiotic on the market. Eliminates gas and bad breath. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Good product and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My vet can't tell me enough how important giving my dog a probiotic is so when I found this chewable at a less than $20 price tag, I gave it a try. Been using it all year and give it to my dog once a day when she's been good so she thinks it's a treat. She rarely has gastro issues and i attribute most of that to this product, as well as to her food.
customer_reviews.author: DeepFushcia

customer_reviews.title: Have been using product for years now
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 Bernese Mt Dogs and have used this product for years along with other supplements. It is a great product, easy to feed and have not had 1 issue with their digestive system. These dogs are Trauma, PSTD and Autism call-out dogs for our local Sheriff's Office when comfort or emotional support is warranted by the Deputy. I highly recommend it as a supplement to a dog's diet
customer_reviews.author: Jared C. Karstetter, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I put my 14-year old chihuahua on this probiotic chew for 3-4 months now. I started seeing the difference around month 2. She seems to be more energetic and her bowel movement became regular and more predictable again. I also see visible improvement in her coat. When she turned 12 her coat started to become dry and I think this probiotic chew helped with that as well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: 💙Recommend & my dogs love
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love them. We like a Probiotic that is a chew & not a powder. High quality ingredients. Fair price. Repeat purchase, many times. Our dogs are wheat, soy & corn free, -this product is too. Made in the USA. 2 Billion CFUs per chew! + Prebiotics & Psyllium husk.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Made gas and loose stool worse
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a good value compared to the other product I was using, but my sensitive girl got really loose stool again and the rooter got really frequent and stinky gas. I suspect the Inulin gave him the gas. Have to throw over half of it away or try to send it back. Big fail for flatulence.
customer_reviews.author: T. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: The best we have tried.
customer_reviews.text: Our Dane has a lot of stomach issues and we are always looking for probiotics that will work. I had done a lot of research and thought we would give these a try. I am so glad we did!! Her stomach problems are few and far between now and she loves these!! She actually thinks she is getting a treat. We are on our sixth order and will continue. Thank you for such an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: nbecher

customer_reviews.title: Loved by the one who needed them...Jake!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that my picky Lab went for them right away!! He eats red meat n chicken but doesn't do dog food so am hoping these help him in the fiber department...we will be back for more! Who knew?? Jake knows!😜
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and good for the tummy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the probiotics for my German Sheppard since he has immunity challenges and I was told by my veterinarian that they can be helpful. My dog loves the duck flavor and I noticed he has more energy, his hot spots are diminishing, and has less tummy disorders.
customer_reviews.author: Ana B

customer_reviews.title: No more loose stools!
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be an outstanding product for my dog with digestive issues. We had previously used a more expensive product, when I found these on Amazon. We get the same results at a much better price. Our dog’s loose stools are greatly improved. We will continue to use these!
customer_reviews.author: Bannda

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Probiotics made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: These are great dog probiotics that are made in the USA! Since putting my dog on this regimen as recommended on the container his breath has greatly improved. Combined with a limited ingredient diet my dog has a much better coat and his skin does not itch as much. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy56

customer_reviews.title: It helps my doggies tummies!
customer_reviews.text: My old dog and younger one have these as their treat. Its healthier treat and help them both to have solid poo. My older odog is picky but the flavor enough for him to eat it. I also see they dont have tummy issues after taking it. They took about 3 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: SUNNY

customer_reviews.title: The value of this product is great but after I stopped using this product I noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: The value of this product is great but after I stopped using this product I noticed my dogs actually stopped having the intense gas they seemingly had for the month I gave this to them. Coincidence? I’m not sure...but I don’t know that I could go through smelling that again.
customer_reviews.author: booka90

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for my Golden Retreiver
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic gives my golden retriever numerous health benefits. He has taken this for months and I’ve noticed the changes in his mood, energy, skin, etc. I will buy this product again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works for me (and the dog)!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Collie with a sensitive stomach, and at times he was having some diarrhea issues. I got the idea to try probiotics, and since he's been eating them, he's had not problems at all. Amen! Active Chews is a good product, as I'm also giving the hip and bone supplement with good results.
customer_reviews.author: RWinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Digestive aid!
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden puppy has been struggling with loose stool for about 2 months. He was diagnosed with Garardia and I needed to find a probiotic supplement to help get his system back on track. This stuff has done the trick. When I first started giving him the chews I had to feed it to him with bananas but that lasted about a week and now he acts like I’m giving him a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect poops? Yes yes yes!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these!! And he is picky picky! I have been struggling with my Beloved chi weenie elimination consistency for months and months! So I decided to try this product and I am sold it is the only supplement he will gladly eat and his poops are Perfect ever since!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lani White

customer_reviews.title: Nice chews but not the best value when you have a pack.
customer_reviews.text: When you have a 120 pound dog plus 3 more animals to give these to - we need more for the money. One dog needs 4, another needs 3, another needs 2, and last but not least, the little one needs 1. That is 10 chews every morning. Crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ever since all my 3 doggies start taking this, their poop smell reduced tremendously. Don’t really see the effect on the bad breath as advertised but I’m very satisfied with the other effects
customer_reviews.author: Y.E

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious and buy locally so you can return if your dog won’t eat it
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not eat this no matter how many times l tried. It would be nice if companies offered samples before purchasing as this is is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Janet V.

customer_reviews.title: MY POMERANIAN LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.text: She enjoys these probiotic treats. I feel good knowing that I don't have to sneak them into her food. Not a guaranteed strategy for her either because she actually sniffs out a vitamin she does not like and separates it from the rest of her food. Really amazing!! I had to crush the vitamin to powder form to prevent her from separating it. Poms are the cutest.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Wright

product_meta.title: Active Chews Premium Probiotics for Dogs with Digestive Enzymes for Dogs from, Relieves Dog Diarrhea Upset Stomach Bad Breath Hot Spots for Dogs, 120 Chews with 4 Bill CFUs per 2 Chews
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE DIGESTIVE HEALTH FOR DOGS: Our Pancreatic Enzymes for Dogs and Immune System Booster helps relieve hot spots for dogs, gas, bloating, dog diarrhea, IBS, constipation, and sensitive stomachs. A daily dose of Active Chews Probiotics with Psyllium Husk will ease their discomfort, develop a stronger immune system and keep your dog happier at all stages of life.

NATURAL ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Our nutritional supplements for dogs uses USA sourced ingredients Psyllium Husk (unique to our formula), Inulin Prebiotic, and 4 Billion CFU’s / 2 Chews and have no dangerous side effects.

DELICIOUS NATURAL DUCK FLAVOR YOUR DOG WILL LOVE: Our veterinary formula uses duck meal and a natural duck flavor that your dog won’t be able to resist. Dogs love the rich taste and velvety texture of our healthy dog treats and you’ll know that your best friend is getting the vital dog supplements for digestive health they need for a better quality of life.

PREMIUM QUALITY PROBIOTICS: We take pride in the premium quality of our probiotics for dogs supplement. Dogs of all sizes love our probiotic chews and our factory is inspected annually by APHIS, and certified by a third party independent lab.

100% MAXIMUM POTENCY: Our No Heat No Cook process ensures your dog gets 100% potency of our digestive enzymes for dogs. Baked treats lose over 50% of their potency, our no cook process doesn’t. The No Heat No Cook process we use ensures your dog gets the full strength of our formula.
